reviewText: I absolutely loved this movie. It has a great story line celebrating 15 years of Heisei Riders against Showa Riders. My only complaint was that there were no subtitles, and it was $90, but it was still worth it.
Loved. Could have done with subtitles but I could live without it.
good fun to watch even with out subs i find that the story is easy to understand even while unable to understand them not that it matters all that is needed to enjoy this is the action
